authorId.description: The account ID of the user who created this page originally.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the page was created. In format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ'.

id.description: The ID of the page.

lastOwnerId.description: The account ID of the user who last edited this page.

ownerId.description: The account ID of the user who owns this page.

parentId.description: ID of the parent page, or null if there is no parent page.

anyOf.description: Content type of the parent, or null if there is no parent.

parentType.description: Content type of the parent, or null if there is no parent.

position.description: Position of child page within the given parent page tree.

spaceId.description: The ID of the space the page is in.

authorId.description: The account ID of the user who created this version.

createdAt.description: The creation date of the version.

minorEdit.description: Indicates whether this version is a minor edit or not.

filesReadonlyListItemsInFolder.description: List the files and folders in a folder

maxSizeInBytes.description: Filter the items by maximum size (in bytes)

modifiedAfter.description: Filter the items modified after the given date

folderId.description: The folder's ID. This could be a unique identifier from the external service, or a relative or absolute path, so long as it's unique.

nextToken.description: The token to get the next page of items. Leave empty to get the first page.

filesReadonlyListItemsInFolder.name: filesReadonlyListItemsInFolder

items.description: The files and folders in the folder

absolutePath.description: The absolute path of the file. Leave empty if not available.

contentHash.description: The hash of the file content, or version/revision number, if available

id.description: The file's ID. This could be a unique identifier from the external service, or a relative or absolute path, so long as it's unique.

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the file, if available

name.description: The file's name. This will be displayed in the Botpress UI and be used as the file's name on Files API."

parentId.description: The parent folder ID. Leave empty if the file is in the root folder.

sizeInBytes.description: The file size in bytes, if available

absolutePath.description: The absolute path of the folder. Leave empty if not available.

id.description: The folder's ID. This could be a unique identifier from the external service, or a relative or absolute path, so long as it's unique.

name.description: The folder's name. This will be displayed in the Botpress UI and be used as the folder's name on Files API."

parentId.description: The parent folder ID. Leave empty if the folder is in the root folder.

nextToken.description: The token to get the next page of items.

filesReadonlyListItemsInFolder.title: List items in folder

filesReadonlyTransferFileToBotpress.description: Transfer a file from an external service to Botpress

absolutePath.description: The absolute path of the file. Leave empty if not available.

contentHash.description: The hash of the file content, or version/revision number, if available

id.description: The file's ID. This could be a unique identifier from the external service, or a relative or absolute path, so long as it's unique.

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the file, if available

name.description: The file's name. This will be displayed in the Botpress UI and be used as the file's name on Files API."

parentId.description: The parent folder ID. Leave empty if the file is in the root folder.

sizeInBytes.description: The file size in bytes, if available

fileKey.description: The file key to use in Botpress

shouldIndex.description: Whether to index the file in vector storage

filesReadonlyTransferFileToBotpress.name: filesReadonlyTransferFileToBotpress

botpressFileId.description: The file ID of the uploaded file on Botpress
